> Demo Profile demo@profile.com Logout close 950395156002-1emg9edo9g73u6bi1uuiksij6r05ddi6.apps.googleusercontent.com Unable to connect server. Failed to connect google services! A network error occurred! Retrying should resolve the problem. User is not authorized to any heating. Unexpected google services error! Unable to encrypt credentials!
User key authenticated by user\'s google account will be saved to the app in the secured way after signing in. \n\n This will ensure that user will stay logged to the heating server from the device until the logout button will be pressed (or until app is uninstalled).
User will clean saved user key stored in the app by pressing logout button.
By checking the checkbox you agree to pass your email and profile identity to the heating server by login to the application in order to identify heating user.
